title: Alfred Pennyworth - Butler
effect: PUSH: Place this card on top of its owner's deck to search your deck for a Character and place it in your hand.

title: Amanda Waller - The Wall
effect: CONSTANT: Your Villain Characters may Link to a Team Attack for 0 MP on the turn they enter play.

title: Deadman - Boston Brand
effect: PLAY: Place a Battle Card from your discard pile into your hand.

title: Firestorm - Nuclear Man
effect: PUSH: KO this card to KO target Character.

title: Martian Manhunter - J'onn J'onzz
effect: CONSTANT: This card may use any Battle Card when defending.

effect: PLAY: Attach a Battle Card with a rank of 7 from your discard pile to target Character.

title: Superboy - Kon-El
effect: PLAY: Choose an attached Battle Card, then return it to its owner's hand or discard it.

title: Mister Freeze - Victor Fries
effect: CONSTANT: Characters with a rank of 7 have their effects negated and cannot defend.

title: Bane - Professional Criminal
effect: PLAY: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

title: Scarecrow - Jonathan Crane
effect: CONSTANT: Whenever this card pushes to attack, your opponent loses 2 MP.

title: Poison Ivy - Pamela Isley
effect: CONSTANT: At the start of your turn, gain 2 MP.

title: Ra's Al Ghul - The Demon's Head
effect: PLAY: You may play a Character from your discard pile with a maximum rank of 5 or less.

title: Absence of Fear
effect: Your opponent shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck, then draws 5 cards.

title: Leap Into Action

title: Birds of a Feather
effect: Each player draws 2 cards.

title: Disgraced
effect: KO target Character with a "constant" effect, or draw 2 cards if there are no Characters with a "constant" effect in play.

title: Echolocation
effect: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent discards that card.

title: Injustice
effect: Characters lose all effects until the end of your next turn. Draw a card.

title: Battle Frenzy
effect: At the end of your turn, draw a card for each Battle Card played this turn.

title: Lose the Battle to Win the War
effect: Return an attached Battle Card to its owner's hand, then shuffle this card into its owner's deck.

title: Overboard
effect: Discard a Character from your hand with a maximum rank of 5 or less to draw 2 cards.

title: Combat Mastery
effect: Until the end of your next turn, your Characters may use any Battle Cards. Draw a card.

title: Resurrection of Power
effect: KO any number of Characters you control, then draw a card for each Character KO'd this way.

title: Reinforcements
effect: Shuffle 2 Battle Cards from your discard pile into your deck, then draw a card.

effect: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

title: Intelligence 1
effect: ATTACK: This attack can only be defended by Characters with an Intelligence Stat.

effect: Each player discards a card from their hand.

effect: ATTACK: This attack can only be defended by a Character with a maximum rank of 5 or less.

title: Intelligence 6
effect: Look at your opponent's hand.

title: Special 6
